list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT bandwidth_line_code FROM bandwidth_lines WHERE is_active=1 AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY bandwidth_line_code
list.label: 带宽线路
list.name: bandwidth_line
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT bandwidth_line_code FROM bandwidth_lines WHERE is_active=1 AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY bandwidth_line_code

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT m.intra_ip FROM bandwidth_lines bl JOIN machines m ON (bl.machine_a_code = m.machine_code OR bl.machine_b_code = m.machine_code) WHERE bl.is_active=1 AND bl.deleted_at IS NULL AND m.deleted_at IS NULL AND m.type='pop' AND bl.bandwidth_line_code LIKE $bandwidth_line
list.label: POP机器列表
list.name: pop_machines
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT m.intra_ip FROM bandwidth_lines bl JOIN machines m ON (bl.machine_a_code = m.machine_code OR bl.machine_b_code = m.machine_code) WHERE bl.is_active=1 AND bl.deleted_at IS NULL AND m.deleted_at IS NULL AND m.type='pop' AND bl.bandwidth_line_code LIKE $bandwidth_line

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT m.intra_ip FROM configs c JOIN machines m ON c.user_machine_code = m.machine_code WHERE c.deleted_at IS NULL AND m.deleted_at IS NULL AND c.status='active' AND c.bandwidth_line_code LIKE $bandwidth_line
list.label: 用户机器列表
list.name: user_machines
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT m.intra_ip FROM configs c JOIN machines m ON c.user_machine_code = m.machine_code WHERE c.deleted_at IS NULL AND m.deleted_at IS NULL AND c.status='active' AND c.bandwidth_line_code LIKE $bandwidth_line
